subject: Re: Order #SSN3348 confirmed
description_text:
Items have still not arrived. I would a credit please. Best regards Bev Sent from my iPhone On 19 Dec 2025, at 13:38, Bev Buxton <bevbuxton@me.com> wrote: ﻿ hi My items did not arrive on the 17th as promised. If they do not arrive tomorrow 20th I shall expect a full refund please Best regards Bev Sent from my iPhone On 12 Dec 2025, at 12:29, service@simsonn.com wrote: ﻿

conversations.body_text: Hi Bev Buxton,    I checked the shipment, and it’s still in transit. Please kindly allow a little more time for delivery.
hi I needed it as a Christmas present. If I haven’t received it on wed I would like a refund please Sent from my iPhone

Hi Bev Buxton,  I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I have confirmed that your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2531701900300945
hi Yes it arrived!! Sent from my iPhone
Hi Bev Buxton,     Great!    Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
